text: Jokceleny Fernandes Carvalho (born 21 October 1992), commonly known as Iniesta, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a midfielder for Sporting Praia Cruz and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. ==International career== Iniesta made his international debut for São Tomé and Príncipe in 2017. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list São Tomé and Príncipe's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" ! No. !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! title: Iniesta (footballer, born 1992)
